meanings.definition: A traditional Indian board game played with dice and tokens.
meanings.sent1: During the family gathering, we enjoyed a game of pachisi.
meanings.sent2: The children sat around the board, eager to start playing pachisi.
meanings.sent3: In the ancient kingdom, pachisi was the favorite pastime of the royals.
meanings.sent4: The colorful tokens in pachisi represent different characters on a journey.
meanings.sent5: The sound of dice rolling in pachisi adds excitement to the game.

meanings.definition: To play the game of pachisi.
meanings.sent1: Let's pachisi together this weekend for some fun.
meanings.sent2: She taught her friends how to pachisi during the sleepover.
meanings.sent3: The siblings pachisi-ed all night, laughing and competing.
meanings.sent4: When feeling bored, they decided to pachisi instead of watching TV.
meanings.sent5: Pachisi-ing with friends always brings joy and laughter.
